fields.name: Braunste Orthopedic Dog Sofa
fields.description: This orthopedic dog bed is the perfect place to lounge for older furry friends and dogs who need extra support. Itâ€™s made from polyester, and it comes in a variety of sizes and colors to choose from that best suit the size of your pup. The bed comes with two side pillows and one long back pillow that are all filled with memory foam and synthetic fiber to cradle your dog as they nap or snuggle. Plus, we love that this dog bed comes with a removable cover that's machine washable for fuss-free upkeep.

fields.name: Juri Dog Sofa
fields.description: Your pooch deserves only the best beauty sleep, so make slumber time more comfy and plush with the Dog Bed Pillow. Thanks to its 100% orthopedic grade, hypoallergenic memory foamâ€•the same quality used in high-end mattressesâ€•it not only provides complete support for a more restful sleep, but can also help soothe joint and muscle discomfort for pups with arthritis, hip dysplasia, and other joint conditions. Its two water-resistant zippered covers protect against messes and can be easily washed, while it's snuggle-friendly, soft micro-suede cover will turn sleepy time into cozy time for your pooch, every night. You will love watching your pal get comfortable with its built-in headrest design, and even if he tosses and turns, an anti-slip rubber bottom will keep the bed in place. Plus, the waterproof liner protects the bed from messes to help keep it clean and hygienic.

fields.name: Corinne Snuggle Dog Sofa
fields.description: Everyone wants to have a cozy spot to curl up at the end of the day, and that includes your furred friends! A bed like this is perfect for giving small dogs (up to 10 lbs.) somewhere to curl up at the end of the night while lending your ensemble an on-trend look. Crafted from foam filling and upholstered in polyester with a chevron pattern, this elevated bed features a wrap-around back perfect for dogs that like to curl up or lean while they sleep. Two pockets at the back let your pup keep their favorite toys in easy reach.

fields.name: Heisler Dog Sofa
fields.description: These pups have found their cozy place right here on this lovely pet sofa. This super-soft fabric is the ultimate in comfort and the cushion cover is removable and washable. The curved back sleep comfort contour design allows them to feel secure and protected. The refined, angled and tapered 3" legs in real wood lift the sofa off the floor for draft-free sleep.

fields.name: Isla Dog Sofa
fields.description: Your pet deserves to nap in comfort and feel like royalty just as you do! This pet sofa offers all of those things and more thanks to its trendy vintage style. Done are the days where the only options were basic cushions in shades of brown; this collection is designed in a soft velvet upholstery with diamond tufted details and scroll wood legs! The fabric is stain resistant and water resistant to simplify your life. For easy cleaning, the cushion fabric is also removable and machine washable so that you can let your machine take care of your petâ€™s little messes. Made by pet lovers for pet lovers, this pet sofa is the pet-sized version of your favorite futon â€“ because your furry friend deserves nothing but the best. Available in multiple color and size options so you can find the perfect one for your pet!

fields.name: Braham Orthopedic Memory Dog Sofa
fields.description: Superior quality 100% orthopedic memory foam dog bed with a waterproof removable liner covers the memory foam mattress and a soft, plush suede cover with an anti-slip bottom to comfortably top it off. This memory foam bed is an orthopedic grade for increased support and ultimate comfort. It will not flatten overtime. Similar to therapeutic foam found in high-end mattress stores. This extra-large orthopedic memory foam dog bed with a pillow can relieve your petâ€™s aches and pains. It is great for pets with arthritis, hip dysplasia, joint, and muscle stiffness or simply to pamper your pooch that so much deserves the best sleep quality.

fields.name: Quebec Dog Sofa
fields.description: Elevate your pet's comfort with this modern pet bed frame! The dog sofa modeled after the human version and crafted of the premium quality metal frame, modern design pairs well with a variety of home interiors. A series of metal slats prevent pet mattress (included) sagging and increases pet mattress life. The memory foam is sure to provide the support and comfort your pets need.

fields.name: Constantine Dog Sofa
fields.description: This dog sofa features an embossed micro-velvet cushion and metallic faux-leather trim. Fully upholstered, of durable, furniture-grade construction, this dog sofa is perfect for dogs who like to sleep curled up.

fields.name: Cauthen Mid Century Plush Dog Sofa
fields.description: Create a warm, comfortable space for your cherished fur baby to curl up and take an afternoon nap. Made to fit small dogs, this dog sofa will soon become the new favorite place for your pet to sleep. Featuring a plush tufted cushion and sleek birch wood legs, this adorable bed is created to be durable as well as stylish, allowing your puppy to rest in unparalleled elegance. Built to last for years and years, your beloved companion will always have a place to relax in comfort and style.

fields.name: Gilleland Dog Sofa
fields.description: Meet Laylani, a beautiful Samoyed, lounging on the elegant Gilleland sofa. The clean lines and plush gray velvet with flat silver nailhead detail, offer a sleek and modern sensibility while feeling solid and secure too. The low profile arms and back provide a perfect place for your pet to lean while resting.

fields.name: Cornelia Dog Sofa
fields.description: The leather is almost always paws-positively luxurious, and your pup is ready to lounge in its lap. Upholstered in easy to clean faux-leather, this sofa carries all of the classic majesties that you and your dog both know they deserve. With traditional details like button tufting, turned legs, and nailhead detailing, this sofa is so glamorous, you may not even need to train them to stay off yours! So they recommend this bed for pups under 80 lbs who like to lean and snuggle while they sleep.

fields.name: Consuelo Dog Sofa
fields.description: Sometimes, we think that we're in control of our house. But eventually, we have to own up to the truth: our pets are the real kings and queens of the castle. Let your furry friend relax in the executive style they deserve with this pet sofa. Upholstered in foam-filled fabric with a tufted back and nail-head detailing, this pet sofa is designed to work well with traditional styles, while also giving your pup the comfort they deserve. This product can support up to 90 lbs.

fields.name: Super Lux Bolster
fields.description: The product will be your dog's new favorite place to relax in style. The wide arm design provides optimal space to sprawl out in comfort. The enhanced AircoolÂ® memory foam provides individual comfort and support for your furry pal. Dual comm technology helps control pesky odors and provides lasting freshness. Available in multiple sizes and colors.

fields.name: Cherri Orthopedic Memory Foam Bolster
fields.description: Perfect for larger pooches (101 lbs. or more!), this orthopedic, memory foam dog cot makes an ideal perch. Its removable microfiber suede cover showcases a solid hue and sits atop a waterproof liner, and features a thick layer of memory foam in the center to keep your pet comfy, as well as an anti-slip rubber bottom to prevent the bed from sliding while Fido is snoozing.

fields.name: Orthopedic Bolster
fields.description: Your pet will be delighted with the comfort with this Sofa Pet bed with premium orthopedic cushioning ergonomic foam. The super-soft plush top is made of faux fur and the removable cover is machine washable.

fields.name: Bagel Bolster
fields.description: Bed type:bolster, chew resistant:No, Material: Faux suede.

fields.name: Beatrice Bernice Quilted Orthopedic Bolster
fields.description: Finally, a solution for your arthritic pets' pain! The sofa bed has a soft, tweed gusset surface providing your pet comfortable while the orthopedic foam base supports your dogâ€™s joints and pressure points. The sofa bed has three walls to give your pup a variety of positions to lay in while remaining comfortable. Your best friend deserves a good nightâ€™s rest and now, itâ€™s possible. With its very own orthopedic pet bed, your loved one will have maximum comfort for a great night's rest. Any position will do on this sofa bed! The squishy bolsters on three sides provide comfort for your pup to lay down in a variety of ways while always being provided the support they need. For example, your dog can lay on their tummy and use one of the bolsters as a pillow for a cozy night of sweet dreams. This luxurious orthopedic dog couch provides a cozy spot for your companion to snuggle up in, leaving your favorite spot on the couch all for you! No more sharing the bed or finding dog hair on the couch. With soft sidewalls and a snuggly quilted surface, your pet wonâ€™t need to count sheep to drift into a deep slumber on this orthopedic dog couch. To suit your home decor, this comfy dog bed is available in five stylish colors, and, for your pup, there are five sizes to ensure maximum comfort while napping. Make your petâ€™s dreams a reality by gifting them with sweet dreams on this cozy sofa bed! Order their new comfy sofa bed today.

fields.name: Orthopedic Pet Calming Bed Soft Warm Cat Dog Nest House Small Large Washable Mat
fields.description: Rectangle pet bed with super soft fleece makes skin more comfortable, padded and stuff extra PP cotton filling in keeps the bed shape over time. 4 Size options, suitable for small, medium, and large pets.

fields.name: Ortho Cuddler Bolster
fields.description: The Serta bolster combines the cradling and support of ortho foam with the cozy comfort of soft, plush interior bolsters to keep your pet feeling secure and comfortable. Zippered cover is easily removed for washing.

fields.name: Hueytown Bolster
fields.description: Perfect for larger pooches (101 lbs. or more!), this orthopedic, memory foam dog cot makes an ideal perch. Its removable microfiber suede cover showcases a solid hue and sits atop a waterproof liner, and features a thick layer of memory foam in the center to keep your pet comfy, as well as an anti-slip rubber bottom to prevent the bed from sliding while Fido is snoozing.

fields.name: Bethany Soft Woven Orthopedic Bolster
fields.description: Finally, a solution for your arthritic pet's pain! This sofa bed has a soft, faux fleece sleep surface providing your pet comfort while the orthopedic ("egg crate") foam base supports your dog's joints and pressure points. The jumbo plus option, for larger breeds, features solid slab orthopedic foam for greater support and comfort. The sofa bed has three walls to give your pup a variety of positions to lay in while remaining comfortable. Your best friend deserves a good nightâ€™s rest and now, itâ€™s possible. With their very own orthopedic pet bed, your loved one will have maximum comfort for a great night's rest. Any position will do on this sofa bed! The squishy bolsters on three sides provide comfort for your pet to lay down in a variety of ways while always being provided the support they need. For example, your dog can lay on their tummy and use one of the bolsters as a pillow for a cozy night of sweet dreams. Cats love our sofa beds also! The bolsters provide cozy walls for your feline friend to snuggle into for their cat naps. This luxurious orthopedic pet couch provides a cozy spot for your companion to snuggle up in, leaving your favorite spot on the couch all for you! No more sharing the bed or finding pet dander on the couch. With soft sidewalls and a snuggly faux fleece sleep surface, your pet wonâ€™t need to count sheep to drift into a deep slumber on this orthopedic dog couch. To suit your home decor, this comfy dog bed is available in three stylish colors and, for your pet, there are five sizes to ensure maximum comfort while napping. Make your petâ€™s dreams a reality by gifting them with sweet dreams on this cozy sofa bed! Make your petâ€™s dreams a reality by gifting them with sweet dreams on this cozy sofa bed!

fields.name: Bella Pet Bolster
fields.description: Give your pup the ultimate support and comfort with the Martha Stewart Bella Pet Couch. This dog bed features incredibly soft memory foam that provides excellent support and comfort for your pet. A non-skid, non-slip bottom helps prevent the pet bed from sliding. Tested for durability and quality, this luxury dog bed offers pure comfort for a restful sleep for your pup.

fields.name: Arvizu Plush and Velvet Deluxe Bolster Bolster
fields.description: Pamper your pet with a new Plush & Velvet Deluxe Chaise Lounge! A luxuriously soft plush sleep surface is complemented by velvet covered bolsters and gussets. Ultra-plush faux fur provides a snuggly soft sleep surface and trims the edges of the bolster for a chic flair. The L-shaped bolsters support your pets back and hips, providing additional support. The L-shape also provides the perfect nook for pets that like to nest into comfort. The two raised, rounded bolster ends allow your pet to lay their paws or neck on the pillowed edge, helping to align the neck and spine. An orthopedic foam base features egg-crate foam that alleviates aching joints and provides soothing comfort to pressure points. The Jumbo Plus option, for larger breeds, features solid slab orthopedic foam for greater support and comfort. The zippered cover is easily removed and machine washable for your convenience. Available in five convenient sizes and three rich color options so your pet can sprawl and lounge the day in maximum comfort and style. Diverse sizing offers the purrfect cat bed or dog bed for your home!

fields.name: Richason Perfect Comfort Bolster
fields.description: The Perfect Comfort Sofa-Style Pet Bed takes dog beds and cat beds to a new level. Designed with oversized, pillow bolsters that wrap around the sleep surface, this luxurious bed is perfect for dogs and cats who crave coziness. The medical-grade foam core includes a layered orthopedic foam core topped with gel-infused memory foam. Microgel beads help keep the bed cooler while memory foam conforms to your pet's shape providing superior support of joints and pressure points. Gel foam has cooling properties reducing the sleeping surface by 1 or 2 degrees, wicking heat away from your pet. The superior support provided by both foam cores will help your pet reach a deeper, more restorative rest for your pet's health. Velvet-soft bolsters are lined with plush faux fur embossed with a classic wave pattern. The bolsters feature a fluffy, insulating filling for your petâ€™s comfort. This bed features a zippered, removable cover to keep the bed fresh and washed. Made in China.

fields.name: Burton Corduroy Sherpa Lined Cave Hooded Dog Bed
fields.description: The corduroy round hooded pet bed with sherpa interior is back and ready for hours of naps, snuggling and hiding! The round construction with a hooded "cave" top is designed to create a comfortable space where your pet can feel snug and protected. It's perfect for pets that like to curl up or sleep under a blanket.

fields.name: Mccree Pet Cave Hooded
fields.description: This ultra-plush pet bed undoubtedly lets your pets feel safe and relaxed. A plush poly shape lining comfortably cradles your pet from head to toe with a wall of cozy fleece, offering a safe, warm environment for sleeping or resting. Your pet would be patient and happy as most dogs and cats love to burrow naturally. The ultra-cozy fleece surrounds your pet with warmth & comfort.

fields.name: Beaudry Cozy Cottage Dome
fields.description: Cozy cottage house shaped pet bed provides a comfy and private space for your dog or cat. The soft sherpa lining provides a warm and comfortable space for your pet. The outside of the house as well as the bottom of the removable sherpa pad are covered in water resistant, easy to clean, canvas. This house is the perfect hideaway and resting spot for both cats or dogs.

fields.name: Boisvert Felt Pet Cave Toby Hooded/Dome
fields.description: This Boisvert Felt Pet Cave Toby Hooded/Dome lightweight, modern pet home is a wonderful and cozy hideaway. Shaped in a cone with an oval opening, it includes an extra comfortable cushion that is removable. Zipper construction enables easy assembly and access throughout for cleaning including the interior. This home can be rolled up and placed into a convenient bag allowing you to carry a familiar spot for your pet when traveling. Its simple and sophisticated design blends easily with your home decor.

fields.name: Ghent Donut Hooded
fields.description: This hooded is privacy just got a lot more luxurious with the pet hooded donut bed. Perfect for dogs or cats who love to nest and hide! Incredibly soft wave faux fur and plush velvet fabrics cradle your pet in a cozy cocoon of comfort and rest. High-loft fiberfill creates a warm, insulating den with deep crevices for snuggling in and nesting. A soft hood provides a blanket of privacy to help pets feel more secure, soothed, and safe. Machine washable. Please see the seam label or tag for full care instructions. Wash instructions: shake or vacuum out excess hair and debris. For best results, wash in a front-loading washing machine or by hand. Do not wash in washer with agitator. No bleach. Do not wring. To help speed drying, press out excess water with a dry towel before placing it in a dryer on medium-low. Dry completely before use.

fields.name: Ilan Cozy Cuddler Covered Cat and Dog Bed Hooded
fields.description: Help your pet feel comfortable and secure! Whether theyâ€™re afraid or feeling anxious, itâ€™s not uncommon for dogs and cats to hide under the bed or other furniture. Not only does it provide a sense of security, but it might also feel warmer and more comfortable. With bolstered walls providing head and neck support, pets can lay in whichever position is best for them! The overstuffed walls and cushion are filled air loft fibers for cloud-like comfort, great for stiff joints and tired legs, encouraging your four-legged friend to get deeper rest. Finished with a nylon bottom, this bed is resistant against dirt and water, allowing them to help protect your floors from damage. Why choose cozy cuddle? Attached blanket for warmth and security generously filled for greater comfort and support water and dirt-resistant bottom safe in the washer and dryer made with pet-safe materials.

fields.name: Schulman Triangular Play Tent Cooper Hooded Dome
fields.description: This stylish pet teepee is a special and cozy hideaway with a flap door opening. It includes a luxurious cushion that is removable and can be used separately if desired. This teepee can be folded and placed into a convenient bag allowing you to carry a familiar spot for your pet when traveling. Its contemporary design blends easily with your home decor.

fields.name: Wayfair Basics Canvas Sherpa Fleece Deep Dish Cave Hooded
fields.description: This hooded dog bed offers your best furry friend the perfect spot to hide, snuggle, and nap for hours. Its rounded construction with a cave top is made from cotton, fleece, and polyester for a tactile touch, and it comes in a variety of sizes and neutral hues to choose from. Inside, this bed is filled with memory foam and synthetic fiber that cushions your pup while they sit. Plus this dog bed comes with a removable cover that you can easily toss in the washing machine for fuss-free upkeep.

fields.name: Boissonneault Felt Pet Cave Lucy Hooded Dog Bed
fields.description: Give your pup a place to play, hide, and snooze with this hooded dog bed. Showcasing a cone-shaped silhouette, this lightweight piece is covered with gray polyester felt fabric that blends easily with a variety of color palettes and aesthetics. An arched doorway makes it easy for Fido to enter and exit, while a removable striped cushion within provides extra padding. Best of all, this bed can be rolled up, so you can easily take it with you on trips.

fields.name: Iowa Vegan Leather Deep Dish Cave Hooded Dog Bed
fields.description: The Leather-look round cave bed has a plush soft and cozy Sherpa interior. The seat cushion is removable and machine washable. Great for breeds that love to the borough.

fields.name: Laidley Hooded
fields.description: Cozy comfort with a cooling twist! Pets who love to burrow under the covers enjoy the pet bed. This product features a soft extra layer of fabric over the sleep surface that can be used as a traditional burrow "blanket" or (by inserting a provided flexible hoop) as a private "cave" for your pet. The lustrous suede fabric on the exterior and gusset provides a stylish, soft look that resists stains and cleans up easily. Soft faux sheepskin sleep surface and hood lining are super snuggly. The laminated gel foam top pet bed core features gel-infused memory foam that is pressure-activated to absorb your pet's body heat and disperse it away from their body to provide a cooling effect. Just like traditional memory foam, the gel top foam will conform to your pet's unique shape to provide the best support for joints and to relieve pressure points. This pair the benefits of cooling gel memory foam with a medical-grade polyurethane foam base to maximize its benefits and ensure the best support for your pet. Pet bed cover is zippered and removable for hand or machine wash. Gel top foam pet bed core is spot clean only.

fields.name: Elnora Hooded Dog Bed
fields.description: These pet beds are perfect for pets who love to burrow into blankets and other cozy spots! The hooded beds are constructed to let your dog or cat burrow and snuggle into the bed, with the top part of the bed functioning as a soft, shapeable, blanket. The soft hood feature can be used with or without the flexible plastic hoop to best suit your petâ€™s sleep style and burrow habits. The plastic hoop helps your pet get under the soft hood but does not stay up so that your pet will stay covered and cozy! The bed is fully lined in cream-colored, faux-sheepskin, and provides a pleasant retreat for your petâ€™s privacy, warmth, and comfort! The thick mattress made from a solid piece of orthopedic foam will promote your dog or catâ€™s ideal posture and joint health. Your pet will love their new cozy pet bed while you'll love having more room in your bed and less pet dander and fur! The cover is zippered and removable for easy care washing.
